children.value: 29. Write a C program to multiply two matrices.

Input elements in the first matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 1
element - [0],[1] : 2
element - [0],[2] : 3
element - [1],[0] : 4
element - [1],[1] : 1
element - [1],[2] : 2
element - [2],[0] : 3
element - [2],[1] : 4
element - [2],[2] : 1
Input elements in the second matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 1
element - [0],[1] : 2
element - [0],[2] : 3
element - [1],[0] : 4
element - [1],[1] : 1
element - [1],[2] : 2
element - [2],[0] : 3
element - [2],[1] : 4
element - [2],[2] : 1

The First matrix is :

1       2       3
4       1       2
3       4       1
The Second matrix is :

1       2       3
4       1       2
3       4       1
The subtraction of two matrix is :

1       4       9
16      1       4
9       16      1
